SeasonPass.EntitlementDescription: When pirates talk about 'the heat of battle', they may be referring to this fiery flintlock.

Base.EntitlementDescription: Reached Distinction Level 1 in Season One.
Daub yourself with an Ancient artefact design - but remember, it won't help you survive the Shroud…
Display your love of Ancient relics - and desire to conquer Season One - by flying this flag.
A Season One design celebrating the sought-after Shroudbreaker, used to reach the Shores of Gold.

SeasonPass.EntitlementDescription: The latest craze sweeping the Sea of Thieves, or perhaps some form of ancient crab worship?

Base.EntitlementDescription: Reached Distinction Level 2 in Season One.
Krakens aren't usually green, but this lantern will turn envious pirates a similar shade.
Glyphs of an Ancient design, inking history across your body. Umbra would be proud.
A glittering eyepatch that could almost have been carved from solid ice. Brr.

SeasonPass.EntitlementDescription: Unleash war upon your enemies from the boiling barrel of your new favourite blunderbuss.

Base.EntitlementDescription: Reached Distinction Level 3 in Season One.
An elegant braid will keep your hair neatly in place. Unfreezing it later is another matter.

Legendary.EntitlementDescription: An intricately twined and twisted facial hair arrangement, kept in place with golden clasps.

Base.EntitlementDescription: Hair piled into a tidy bun atop your head, kept in place thanks to the power of an icy shard.
The precious stone transforms this length of old rope into a hardy fashion accessory.

SeasonPass.EntitlementDescription: Doubles as a tribute to the Red Crested Breegull, a very rare bird indeed.

Base.EntitlementDescription: Reached Distinction Level 4 in Season One.
A thick beard helps retain body heat. Adorning it with glittering chunks of ice? Not so much.
Heavy boots with soles that help stop even the most stupefied pirate from slipping.

SeasonPass.EntitlementDescription: This cutlass glows so fiercely, it could almost be straight from a weaponsmith's forge.

Base.EntitlementDescription: Reached Distinction Level 5 in Season One.
With a stunning sapphire and perky feather, this hat absolutely must be worn at a rakish angle.

Legendary.EntitlementDescription: Long, luxurious locks which prove that Pirate Legends don't often have time for a trim.

Base.EntitlementDescription: This timber will never shiver, as the pegleg is reinforced against harsh weather.

SeasonPass.EntitlementDescription: This rod honours the Splashtail, many a proud pirate's first catch. And second. And third…

Base.EntitlementDescription: Reached Distinction Level 6 in Season One.
A striking two-tone wheel that offers a black-and-white solution to steering your ship.
Gloves are perfect for chilly nights – frozen fingers can’t play shanties, after all.

SeasonPass.EntitlementDescription: As casually nonchalant as the Strangers themselves.

Base.EntitlementDescription: Reached Distinction Level 7 in Season One.

Legendary.EntitlementDescription: A hair-raising approach to personal grooming that keeps long locks up and out of the way.

Base.EntitlementDescription: A dress made of thick fabric that provides both style and snugness.
A hook so hardy, you could even use it to carve your initials into an iceberg.

SeasonPass.EntitlementDescription: Be careful how you handle this red-hot rifle. You can't pull a trigger with burned fingers.

Base.EntitlementDescription: Reached Distinction Level 8 in Season One.
Lunging through the air with this won't make you soar like a parrot, but it's a start.
Nice warm legs are the key to making a speedy escape with treasure in hand.

SeasonPass.EntitlementDescription: A figurehead fit for an apex predator - bright, ferocious and hungry for battle!

Base.EntitlementDescription: Reached Distinction Level 9 in Season One.

Base.EntitlementText: Eastern Winds Jade Eye of Reach
Base.EntitlementDescription: An expertly crafted weapon with a long, jade dragon design coiled along its length.
A thick jacket that keeps out the cold. Handy if you’re stuck up in the crow’s nest.

SeasonPass.EntitlementDescription: The Splashtail Monarch in folklore provides bounty from the sea… and maybe the occasional nightmare.

Base.EntitlementDescription: Reached Distinction Level 10 in Season One.
Durable headgear that helps keep your cunning pirate brain warm and toasty.
Old wounds from a pitched battle that took place at the distant Shores of Gold? Oh, go on then.

Legendary.EntitlementDescription: Almost nobody asks to be cursed, but Pirate Legends can show this magical malady with pride.

SeasonPass.EntitlementDescription: Sky-blue cloth emblazoned with a silver skull-and-swords makes for some seriously fancy sails.

Goals.Title: Purchase a Trading Company Voyage.
Vote on a Voyage proposed by another pirate.
Sail miles across the sea while on a Voyage.

Challenges.Title: Novice Voyager
Challenges.Copy: Take part in a swift Trial to learn the basics of embarking on Trading Company Voyages.

Goals.Title: Perform a sharp 'anchor turn' move.
Sail miles across the sea.
Sail with all your sails billowing in the wind.

Challenges.Title: Novice Sailor
Challenges.Copy: Even the longest journey begins by setting sail. Find your sea legs with this swift Trial.

Goals.Title: Speak to the Mysterious Stranger in any tavern.
Begin any Tall Tale. The first is 'The Shroudbreaker', a book found next to the Mysterious Stranger in any tavern.
During 'The Shroudbreaker' Tall Tale, recover the ship log of the Magpie's Wing.

Challenges.Title: Novice Story Seeker
Challenges.Copy: The Sea of Thieves is full of Tall Tales. Experience one for yourself as part of this swift Trial.

Goals.Title: Deliver a Cargo Run's items to their destination in any condition.
Hand in a Gunpowder Barrel to the Merchant Alliance.
Hand in an animal to the Merchant Alliance.

Challenges.Title: Novice Merchant
Challenges.Copy: Join forces with the Merchant Alliance and ferry goods across the waves in this swift Trial.

Goals.Title: Speak to Larinna outside any tavern.
Kill a shark using a Gunpowder Barrel.
Hand in an Ashen Key, Chest or Tome to Larinna or to the Reaper's Bones.

Challenges.Title: Novice Bilge Rat
Challenges.Copy: Bilge Rats crave adventure and excitement. Get a taste of it by completing this swift Trial.

Goals.Title: Finish a Voyage for each of the Trading Companies.
Use the Captain's Table to vote on a Voyage.
Sail miles across the sea while on a Voyage.

Challenges.Title: Proficient Voyager
Challenges.Copy: Take on varied Voyages from the Trading Companies and earn their trust in this grand Trial.

Goals.Title: Race alongside another crew's ship - no firing!
Sail miles across the sea.

Challenges.Title: Proficient Sailor
Challenges.Copy: Prove that you can fearlessly steer your ship by completing this grand Trial.

Goals.Title: Discover and read Journals while on a Tall Tale.
Successfully complete Tall Tales.
Reach a checkpoint in at least 6 Tall Tales.

Challenges.Title: Proficient Story Seeker
Challenges.Copy: Seeking out and conquering Tall Tales from across the Sea of Thieves will also conquer this grand Trial.

Goals.Title: Deliver a Cargo Run's Items on time and in perfect condition.
Hand in a chicken, a pig and a snake.
Hand in a Stronghold Gunpowder Barrel.

Challenges.Title: Proficient Merchant
Challenges.Copy: Precision and punctuality will be needed to please the Merchants and finish this grand Trial.

Goals.Title: Set foot on any island within The Devil's Roar.
Collect a red Flame of Fate from the Ferry.
Complete any Gold Hoarders, Order of Souls or Athena's Fortune Voyage within The Devil's Roar.
Deliver Devil’s Roar Cargo Run items in any condition.
Hand in a Chest of Rage.

Challenges.Title: Proficient Scorcher
Challenges.Copy: You'll need to overcome fire, ash and falling rocks to conquer this heated grand Trial.

Goals.Title: Deliver both an Ashen Chest and Ashen Key to Larinna or to the Reaper's Bones.
Deliver an Ashen Tome to Larinna or to the Reaper's Bones.
Locate and speak with Duke, former Bilge Rat, wherever he may be lurking.

Challenges.Title: Proficient Bilge Rat
Challenges.Copy: Earn some real respect from the Bilge Rats by handing in valuable treasures in this grand Trial.

Goals.Title: Hit ships with Chainshots.
Sail miles across the sea.
Sail miles across the sea while on a Voyage.

Challenges.Title: Expert Sailor
Challenges.Copy: Only those who can claim to tame the waves will succeed at this epic Trial.

Goals.Title: Speak with the Ferryman, Madame Olivia, Grace, Tallulah and the Mysterious Stranger.
Complete all available Tall Tales.
Find all Journals within the Tall Tales.

Challenges.Title: Expert Story Seeker
Challenges.Copy: When you've completed this epic Trial, you'll have plenty of Tall Tales of your own to tell!

Goals.Title: Complete the 'Heart of Fire' Tall Tale.
Complete a Legendary Voyage in The Devil's Roar.
Deliver Devil's Roar Cargo Run items, on time and in perfect condition.
Hand in a Chest of Rage stolen from another crew.
Set foot on all islands within The Devil's Roar.

Challenges.Title: Expert Scorcher
Challenges.Copy: Only embracing the geysers and volcanoes of The Devil's Roar will see this epic Trial completed.

ChallengeGroups.Title: Trials of Adventure
ChallengeGroups.Copy: Accept Voyages, take on Tall Tales and more!

Goals.Title: Find and examine a nameplate at Shipwreck Bay, or a unique rock painting at Snake Island, Plunder Valley or Thieves' Haven.
Set foot on an island somewhere on the waves.
Speak to Umbra at her camp located on the Lagoon of Whispers.

Challenges.Title: Aspiring Explorer
Challenges.Copy: Get to know the Sea of Thieves and learn its secrets in this swift Trial.

Goals.Title: Catch a wild animal in a cage.
Start an island campfire at night and cook some food.
Pick up treasure that's been washed up on a shore.

Challenges.Title: Aspiring Scavenger
Challenges.Copy: The sea provides! Learn to harvest nature's riches with this swift Trial.

Goals.Title: Find and read one of Umbra's Journals.
Find and examine some of Umbra's Immortalisations.
Speak to Umbra at her camp located on the Lagoon of Whispers.

Challenges.Title: Aspiring Historian
Challenges.Copy: Learn the legends of pirates past in this swift Trial, delving into the greatest stories ever told.

Goals.Title: Acquire a Flame of Fate from the Ferry.
Use your lantern to light a beacon with any Flame of Fate.
Light your ship's lanterns with blue or white Flames of Fate.

Challenges.Title: Aspiring Lightbringer
Challenges.Copy: How you died is reflected in the Ferry's Well of Fates. Claim the Flames to complete this swift Trial.

Goals.Title: Catch a fish on Old Sailor Isle.
Find any Journal on Old Sailor Isle.
Complete the Maiden Voyage.

Challenges.Title: Aspiring Pioneer
Challenges.Copy: Your Maiden Voyage began just beyond the Sea of Thieves. Relive it in this swift Trial.

Goals.Title: Cook some chicken on a campfire on Old Sailor Isle.
Find a Rowboat on Old Sailor Isle.
Fire yourself from the cannon of the wrecked ship on Old Sailor Isle.

Challenges.Title: Accomplished Pioneer
Challenges.Copy: Dig deep into the hidden secrets of the Maiden Voyage to complete this grand Trial.

Goals.Title: Find and destroy a Cursed Mermaid Statue.
Set foot on an island in each of the four regions.
Visit a Skeleton Fort.
Visit a Seapost.

Challenges.Title: Accomplished Explorer
Challenges.Copy: The more you venture out into the world, the closer you'll come to completing this grand Trial.

Goals.Title: Hand in a Shipwrecked Chest to the Gold Hoarders.
Hand in a supply crate of any kind.
Hand in an Ashen Chest to Larinna or the Reaper's Bones.

Challenges.Title: Accomplished Scavenger
Challenges.Copy: Search high and low for valuables, then sell them on for a profit to complete this grand Trial.

Goals.Title: Find some of Umbra's Immortalisations.
Find all of Umbra's Journals.
Find and examine a nameplate at Shipwreck Bay, or a unique rock painting at Snake Island, Plunder Valley or Thieves' Haven.

Challenges.Title: Accomplished Historian
Challenges.Copy: Gaining a more complete understanding of legendary pirates is the key to this grand Trial.

Goals.Title: Sail to Thieves' Haven.
Sit on the Throne at Thieves' Haven.
Sit on a Throne hidden in a sunken cave on K-9.

Challenges.Title: Throne Seeker
Challenges.Copy: Sitting in Skeleton Thrones across the Sea of Thieves will see this grand Trial defeated.

Goals.Title: Sit in the Throne at Shipwreck Bay with another crew.
Sit in the Throne atop Devil's Ridge.
Sit in the Throne atop Hidden Spring Keep.
Sit in the Throne atop Mermaid's Hideaway.

Challenges.Title: Throne Climber
Challenges.Copy: Skeleton Thrones high overhead must be reached to complete this grand Trial.

Goals.Title: Hand in a Mermaid Gem to the Gold Hoarders.
Hand in a Mermaid Gem to the Merchant Alliance.
Hand in a Mermaid Gem to the Order of Souls.
Destroy all three kinds of Cursed Mermaid Statue.

Challenges.Title: Accomplished Statue Smasher
Challenges.Copy: Cursed Mermaid Statues lurk beneath the waves. Destroy them to complete this grand Trial.

Goals.Title: Open Treasure Vaults.
Ring the bell high atop the Sea Dogs' Tavern.
Find a way to reach the Shores of Gold.

Challenges.Title: Master Explorer
Challenges.Copy: Visiting every last corner of the Sea of Thieves is the only way to complete this epic Trial.

Goals.Title: Sit in all small Skeleton Thrones.
Sit in all large Skeleton Thrones with another crew.

Challenges.Title: Master of Thrones
Challenges.Copy: Ascending to every Skeleton Throne and taking your rightful place will defeat this epic Trial.

Goals.Title: Hand in Emerald Mermaid Gems.
Hand in Ruby Mermaid Gems.
Hand in Sapphire Mermaid Gems.
Destroy Cursed Mermaid Statues.

Challenges.Title: Master Statue Smasher
Challenges.Copy: Complete this epic Trial and ensure that the seas are that much safer for unwary pirates.

Goals.Title: Find and read all of the Pirate Lord's Journals.
Unlock the hold of the Magpie's Fortune.

Challenges.Title: Master Pioneer
Challenges.Copy: Leave no stone unturned in the Maiden Voyage to chart the Pirate Lord's legacy in this epic Trial.

ChallengeGroups.Title: Trials of Exploration
ChallengeGroups.Copy: Journey across the ocean and meet its inhabitants.

Goals.Title: Destroy skeletons.
Destroy a Skeleton Captain.
Hand in a Bounty Skull.

Challenges.Title: Ambitious Mercenary
Challenges.Copy: The Sea of Thieves is swarming with skeletons. Smash a few skulls as part of this swift Trial.

Goals.Title: Hand in any type of skull to the Servant of the Flame.
Hand in a Reaper's Chest or Reaper's Bounty Chest to the Reapers.
Become an Emissary for The Reaper’s Bones.

Challenges.Title: Ambitious Reaper
Challenges.Copy: Ally with The Reaper's Bones in a swift, but risky, Trial.

Goals.Title: Find a way to set a skeleton on fire.
Catch a Devilfish within The Devil's Roar.
Set foot on any island within The Devil's Roar.

Challenges.Title: Ambitious Firestarter
Challenges.Copy: Fire can be a hazard, but also an opportunity. Fan the flames in this swift, smoky Trial.

Goals.Title: Hand in a broken Emissary Flag as a Reaper's Bones Emissary.
Purchase and equip the Reaper's Bones Costume as a Reaper's Bones Emissary.
Hit a ship with a firebomb fired from a cannon.
Reach Grade 3 as a Reaper's Bones Emissary.

Challenges.Title: Infamous Reaper
Challenges.Copy: As a loyal follower of The Reaper's Bones, you'll need aggression and cunning for this grand Trial.

Goals.Title: Destroy Skeleton Captains.
Hand in Villainous Bounty Skulls to the Order of Souls or the Reaper's Bones.
Destroy an Ashen Guardian.

Challenges.Title: Infamous Mercenary
Challenges.Copy: As your fame increases, you'll need to take on more difficult targets to complete this grand Trial.

Goals.Title: Hand in broken Reaper's Bones Emissary Flags as a Reaper's Bones Emissary.
Hand in a Reaper's Chest.
Hand in a Reaper's Bounty Chest.

Challenges.Title: Defiant Reaper
Challenges.Copy: Handing in loot that exposes your position is no easy feat, but will complete this grand Trial.

Goals.Title: Complete a Ghost Ship Voyage for the Order of Souls.
Hand in Skulls of the Damned.
Defeat Flameheart's flagship, the Burning Blade.

Challenges.Title: Ghost Hunter
Challenges.Copy: Clear the seas of spirits and spectres to complete this grand, spine-tingling Trial.

Goals.Title: Rock another crew's ship using a Wraith Cannonball.
Hit a ship with different types of purple Cursed Cannonball, while flying the Reaper's Mark flag.
Read Wanda's Journal on Thieves' Haven.

Challenges.Title: Warsmith
Challenges.Copy: Follow in the footsteps of an infamous Skeleton Lord to finish this warmongering grand Trial.

Goals.Title: Explode Gunpowder Skeletons in a chain reaction.
Take out a group of 3 skeletons using a Gunpowder Skeleton.
Kill a shark using a Gunpowder Barrel.

Challenges.Title: Infamous Detonator
Challenges.Copy: The colossal kabooms of Gunpowder Barrels are the only way to defeat this grand Trial.

Goals.Title: Burn a group of 3 skeletons at the same time.
Burn skeletons using an Ashen Winds Skull.
Hit a ship with a firebomb fired from a cannon.

Challenges.Title: Infamous Firestarter
Challenges.Copy: The heat is turned up in this fiery grand Trial, which is all about setting things ablaze.

Goals.Title: Capture animals in cages.
Disable tentacles while fighting the Kraken.
Defeat different breeds of Megalodon.
Find and defeat the Kraken.

Challenges.Title: Deadly Hunter
Challenges.Copy: This epic Trial will see you battling the most dangerous creatures of all - sea monsters!

Goals.Title: Hand in all types of Bounty Skulls to the Order of Souls.
Defeat every Skeleton Lord on land at least once.
Equip the Order of Souls Costume and ship livery as an Order of Souls Emissary.
Light up a Skeleton Ship using an Ashen Winds Skull.

Challenges.Title: Deadly Mercenary
Challenges.Copy: Only an undisputed skeleton slayer will make it through this epic Trial and live to tell the tale.

Goals.Title: Hand in Athena's Fortune items to the Reaper's Bones.
Hand in Gold Hoarder items to the Reaper's Bones.
Hand in Merchant Alliance items to the Reaper's Bones.
Hand in Order of Souls items to the Reaper's Bones.
Hand in a broken Emissary Flag from each Company as a Reaper's Bones Emissary.
Hand in a Chest of Ancient Tributes and a Vault Key to the Reaper's Bones.
Equip the Reaper's Bones Costume and full ship livery as a Reaper's Bones Emissary.

Challenges.Title: Deadly Reaper
Challenges.Copy: Completing this epic Trial will prove your eternal, unwavering loyalty to The Reaper's Bones.

Goals.Title: Hand in a Stronghold Gunpowder Barrel.
Destroy a group of 3 Gold Skeletons using one Gunpowder Skeleton.
Destroy a group of 3 Plant Skeletons using one Gunpowder Skeleton.
Destroy a group of 3 Shadow Skeletons using one Gunpowder Skeleton.
Destroy a group of 5 skeletons using one Gunpowder Skeleton, at a Fort, with another crew present.

Challenges.Title: Deadly Detonator
Challenges.Copy: Using Gunpowder Skeletons to blow up their friends is a satisfying way to beat this epic Trial.

Goals.Title: Defeat Flameheart's Ghost Ships while in an Alliance.
Hand in a broken Grade 5 Reaper Emissary Flag as a Reaper's Bones Emissary.
Finish the Fort of the Damned while in an Alliance.

Challenges.Title: Alliance Adept
Challenges.Copy: Whether sinking Reapers or forging Alliances, this epic Trial requires locating other crews.

ChallengeGroups.Title: Trials of Combat
ChallengeGroups.Copy: Battle against skeletons, monsters and other crews.

Goals.Title: Cook a piece of food until burnt.
Cook a piece of meat to perfection.
Eat perfectly cooked Trophy Fish of any kind.

Challenges.Title: Apprentice Cook
Challenges.Copy: Demonstrate your culinary craft and fill your belly with this swift Trial.

Goals.Title: Drink so much grog that your pirate is sick.
Play a shanty together with three other pirates in Adventure Mode.

Challenges.Title: Party Pirate
Challenges.Copy: Relax, raise a tankard and get to grips with celebrating your misdeeds in this swift Trial.

Goals.Title: Go fishing and catch a fish.
Hand in cooked animal meat to The Hunter's Call.
Hand in any Trophy Fish to The Hunter's Call. Cook it to perfection and earn more gold for it!

Challenges.Title: Apprentice Hunter
Challenges.Copy: This swift Trial helps you get used to catching and cooking hearty meals in the wilderness.

Goals.Title: Finish a Cargo Run Voyage while in an Alliance.
Form an Alliance with another crew.
Let another crew cash in one of your chests.

Challenges.Title: Apprentice Diplomat
Challenges.Copy: Not every encounter needs to end in a fight. Practise your people skills in this swift Trial.

Goals.Title: Drink with another crew while at any Outpost.
Greet another pirate on the Ferry of the Damned, using a Pirate Chat phrase.
Play an instrument while aboard your ship as it sinks.

Challenges.Title: Socialite
Challenges.Copy: Learn how to make merry, quench your thirst and have fun with this swift Trial.

Goals.Title: Block another pirate's attack, then strike them!
Revive a fallen crewmate before they die.
Hoard a number of chests at once.

Challenges.Title: Experienced Crewmate
Challenges.Copy: You'll learn to defend your crew and take bigger risks as you work to complete this grand Trial.

Goals.Title: Defeat a Skeleton Ship while in an Alliance.
Defeat Flameheart's Ghost Ships while in an Alliance.
Be in an Alliance with all ships' lanterns the same colour.

Challenges.Title: Experienced Diplomat
Challenges.Copy: Your skill at forming and maintaining Alliances will be tested during this grand Trial.

Goals.Title: Drink with another crew while at any Outpost.
Defeat skeletons that have been affected by a Grogball.
Throw a bucket of vomit on an enemy pirate holding a sword.

Challenges.Title: Experienced Reveller
Challenges.Copy: Your tankard skills are the talk of the tavern - perfect for handling this grand Trial.

Goals.Title: Catch Trophy Fish.
Hand in pieces of cooked Megalodon or Shark meat to The Hunter's Call.
Defeat a Megalodon.

Challenges.Title: Experienced Hunter
Challenges.Copy: Seeking larger, more dangerous prey will be a necessary peril when completing this grand Trial.

Goals.Title: Hoard a huge number of chests at once.
Launch from a cannon and land on another ship.

Challenges.Title: Thrillseeker
Challenges.Copy: Tackling these daring Deeds will pile on the pressure - and complete this epic Trial!

Goals.Title: Hand in Chests of a Thousand Grogs to the Gold Hoarders.
Drink with other crews while at any Outpost on a number of separate occasions.
Defeat skeletons that have been affected by a Grogball.
Play a shanty with pirates from another crew.
Throw a bucket of vomit on an enemy pirate holding a sword.

Challenges.Title: Life and Soul
Challenges.Copy: You'll need to embrace your inner party animal and get rowdy to complete this epic Trial.

Goals.Title: Perfectly cook pieces of Kraken meat.
Perfectly cook pieces of Megalodon meat.
Cook some pieces of food until burnt.
Hand in pieces of sea monster meat to The Hunter's Call.
Eat pieces of sea monster meat.

Challenges.Title: Seasoned Cook
Challenges.Copy: No matter how exotic the ingredients, preparing sumptuous suppers will complete this epic Trial.

ChallengeGroups.Title: Trials of the Sea
ChallengeGroups.Copy: Conquer the many challenges of the pirate life.

SeasonPass.Title: Plunder Pass
SeasonPass.Copy: Purchase a Plunder Pass for the chance to earn extra Seasonal rewards as your Renown grows!
